member.name: T:Touch

member.name: M:getTouch
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:waitTouched
member.summary: A method that will wait Touch sensor pressed. *The program will wait it done.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.
